author: Reuters
title: Pass the salt: Tiny details that helped Germany build virus defences
description: Pass the salt: Tiny details that helped Germany build virus defences In Germany so far, over 2,100 people have died. In Italy, with a smaller population, the total exceeds 17,600.
content:
MUNICH: One January lunchtime in a car parts company, a worker turned to a colleague and asked to borrow 
thesalt.
As well as 
the saltshaker, in that instant, they shared 
the new coronavirus, scientists have since concluded.
That their exchange was doc… [+8664 chars]
